name: Newspapers 'N' Novichok [GAME JAM]
description:
Controls:

D Key or Right Arrow to move through the pages.

Right Click to stamp a story.

Newspaprs 'N' Novichok is a short 'Papers Please' esque game made for the [Snappy Gurus] game jam.

You live in Borzpova and have a comfy life working as the head of a newspaper agency 

until one day the glorious council decide that to boost moral, papers must become more positive and focus on keeping the populous submissive.

 With the threat of assassination or imprisonment looming over head if you fail to comply, its either Newspapers or Novichok!

Made in 30 hours, enjoy!

-BlobbySquad.

main theme - Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/free-music/soviet-march

bad end theme - SergeQuadrado - https://pixabay.com/music/folk-sadly-88769/

good end theme - SergeQuadrado - https://pixabay.com/music/folk-russian-morning-88764/

bg music - SergeQuadrado - https://pixabay.com/music/acoustic-group-russian-loop-88763/
